column5: The home is in West University Place, one of the most coveted neighborhoods in Houston. This great home is directly across from Rice Village, near Upper Kirby, Texas Medical Center, River Oaks, Downtown, nightlife, public transport, parks, and shopping/dining options. Reservation can include personal chef, concierge services, and driver upon request. The home is best suited for any type of traveler from couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, or friends.
column8: West University Place Bungalow - Rice Village/TMC
